amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 4, 9, 10, 11, 12, 14, 15, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, and 23 printed in House Report 113-251.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Shuster.
Shuster amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendments (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
